entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy after midnight with 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 7:31 PM MST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Periods of snow beginning near noon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the morning. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 7:31 PM MST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 11.
